thread.section_title: Hotel Manfredi Suite in Rome - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: mini vacation with friends
thread.title_full: mini vacation with friends - Review of Hotel Manfredi Suite in Rome, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: lylrya
title: mini vacation with friends
text: This was a great hotel for a good price. I traveled with 2 other friends and we all stayed in one room. Prior to arrival they hotel reached out to us to see if we needed the 3 beds. Staff was nice and helpful! The location was safe and great things close by to walk to. I will defiantly come back again should I be in Rome.
